Liverpool were able to recovered from a goal down to stun Chelsea at Prenton Park on their return to the Womens Super League after a two-year absence. As early as … [+5847 chars]

articles.author: Andy Bull
articles.title: Moeen Ali proud to lead England in Pakistan as T20 World Cup looms - The Guardian
articles.description: The all-rounder will captain the side in the first match of England’s T20 series in the land of his mother’s birth
articles.content: Moeen Ali has been waiting for this tour. He has been dreaming about it since he felt he had earned his place in the England team. But he never imagined he would be captain when it finally happened. … [+6396 chars]
